actions.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate to ascertain and settle claims arising out of anthrax exposure in the Senate complex.

summary.text: Authorizes the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate: (1) to prescribe, consider, and ascertain any claim filed by December 31, 2002, incident to service by a Member, officer, or employee of the Senate for any damage to, or loss of, personal property, for which such individual has not been reimbursed, resulting from the anthrax incident of October 15, 2001, or the related remediation efforts undertaken through March 15, 2002; and (2) with the approval of the Committee on Rules and Administration and in accordance with Federal claims law, determine, compromise, adjust, and settle such claim in an amount not exceeding $4,000 per claimant.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the Sergeant at Arms and Doorkeeper of the Senate to ascertain and settle claims arising out of anthrax exposure in the Senate complex.
